detail_desc: Dress with a matching hairband in soft organic cotton. Sleeveless dress with buttons on the shoulders and a sewn-in bodysuit with elasticated hems and press-studs at the crotch. Hairband with a sewn-in knot at the front and covered elastic at the back of the neck.

Dress with a matching hairband in soft organic cotton. Sleeveless dress with buttons on the shoulders and a sewn-in bodysuit with elasticated hems and press-studs at the crotch. Hairband with a sewn-in knot at the front and covered elastic at the back of the neck.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, straight-cut, quilted coat in a patterned viscose weave with a yoke at the back and on the shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with a seam at the cuffs, a concealed drawstring at the waist and no fasteners. Light padding.
Print-patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Print-patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Print-patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Boots in imitation leather with studs, pointed toes and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5 cm.

Open-sided ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and adjustable straps with a metal fastener and studs. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with open sections at the sides and metal studs along the edges. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.

Platform shoes in imitation suede with closed lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam and braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front approx 4 cm, heel approx 7 cm.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky polyurethane soles.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky polyurethane soles.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky polyurethane soles.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside and a stand-up collar with a zip and chin guard at the front. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lightly padded, patterned jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Leather boots with round toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Heel 4 cm.
Suede ankle boots with elastication at the front, a loop at the back, pointed toes and covered heels. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Calf-length trousers in jersey with a high, elasticated waist and wide legs with stripes down the sides.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Pockets in the side seams and straight legs with creases front and back.
Suede boots with pointed toes and block heels. Satin linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5 cm.
Wide trousers in an airy weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt at the front. Straight legs with thigh-high slits. Unlined.
Wide trousers in an airy weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt at the front. Straight legs with thigh-high slits. Unlined.
Wide trousers in an airy weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt at the front. Straight legs with thigh-high slits. Unlined.
Wide trousers in an airy weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt at the front. Straight legs with thigh-high slits. Unlined.
Leather boots with a soft shaft at the top, round toes, a zip at the front with a decorative metal ring and covered block heels. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Suede ankle boots with low heels, pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. High, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. High, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined patterned bikini. One-shoulder top with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap at one side and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the other shoulder. Matching bikini bottoms.
Fully lined patterned bikini. Triangle top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a plastic fastener at the back and a frill-trimmed hem. Matching bikini bottoms.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with lace. Opening cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, patterned smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/7/8.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Button details at the neckline and cuffs.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Button details at the neckline and cuffs.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Button details at the neckline and cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shorter blouse in jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck and wrapover front with a wide flounced trim that continues around the back of the neck. Long sleeves with frill-trimmed buttoned cuffs, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and covered buttons to the hem.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline with pleats front and back, and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline with pleats front and back, and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumpsuit in soft viscose with a V-neck, wrapover front, elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and long, wide legs.
Short-sleeved jumpsuit in jersey made from a modal blend with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs.
Jumpsuit in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, buttons at the top, short dolman sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline and front pocket. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and ribbing around the neckline and hems.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline and front pocket. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and ribbing around the neckline and hems.
Cardigan in an extra-soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Fitted body in stretch, ribbed jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Top and pair of shorts in soft, brushed jersey. Top with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Top and pair of shorts in soft, brushed jersey. Top with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a round neck and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a round neck and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Wide trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, ribbed waistband.
Short, straight-style dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Trousers in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a wide, elasticated waist and long, wide legs.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched inside. Darker sections where protective pieces of fabric have been ripped off after washing. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and legs with decorative stitching and narrow hems.
V-neck top in soft pointelle jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
V-neck top in soft pointelle jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
